casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie CAPLE. No. 437P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Victoria L. Voight, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of July 2006 by Defendant to Dissolve Stay: "Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006." Justice BRADY recused.
